dcterms:creator: Daniel Lundqvist
Anders Flykt
Arne Öhman
dcterms:description: KDEF is a multi-view emotion recognition dataset with 7 expressions (afraid, angry, happy, sad, surprised, disgust, and neutral), where each subject is imaged from 5 different views (-90°: full left, -45°: half left, 0°: straight, +45°: half right, and +90°: full right). The dataset was collected from 140 subjects.
dcterms:title: KDEF

dcterms:creator: Kirsten A Dalrymple
Jesse Gomez
Brad Duchaine
dcterms:description: DDCF is a multi-view dataset collected from 80 subjects. It contains 8 expression classes (afraid, angry, happy, sad, surprised, disgust, pleased, and neutral), from 5 different views (-60°: full left, -30°: half left, 0°: straight, +30°: half right, and +60°: full right).
dcterms:title: DDCF
